subtitle: Cod in a tangy sauce.

method.text: Preheat grill. Dip cod strips in soy sauce and grill for about 5 minutes or until golden.

Meanwhile, make sauce: Mix fruit juice, shallots, tarragon and rosemary in saucepan. Boil until reduced to a third. Add cream and heat gently but do not boil. Add butter a little at a time, mixing well. Check seasoning.
Place fish strips on top of rice (if using) and pour sauce around edge.

title: Grilled cod strips with ruby orange sauce
